Author: crumb#2550
Content:
also this:

Dear Poloniex Customer,

We have taken steps to begin removing margin trading for BTS, CLAM, FCT, and MAID. Effective immediately, you will no longer be able to extend or increase your positions in these four markets, though they will remain available for spot trading. All open margin orders have been canceled, and only orders that reduce your open margin positions will be accepted going forward. On July 8th, we will begin shutting down these margin markets, so please close your margin positions as soon as possible.

Please note that we are taking these steps to protect our lenders and traders in these specific markets. For margin liquidations to process in an orderly manner, the market needs sufficient liquidity and these markets currently lack that liquidity. We will continue to monitor them and may reinstate margin trading in the future. While this may be frustrating as a margin trader, we are confident that this is the right choice to protect our customers.

As always, you can reach out to us at support@poloniex.freshdesk.com with any questions or concerns.

Thank you for your attention to this matter,

The Poloniex Team
